name: Growth shooter (BodaMat, NazarDoe)
description:
Ahh, my fail. I forgot to test the published version of the game. Here is the itch.io page for the version that is playable: Growth shooter by BodaMat (itch.io) (the only change I made is an export change that made sure that the game is playable) I published it after 1 min the submission was closed

Simple top-down shooter. Become the biggest player on the map!

Tutorial

Nice to see you here. The goal is so simple. Kill as many enemies as possible. 

When you or the enemy kill somebody then grows. When you shoot at the enemy, it becomes smaller. To kill a player's enemy should be so small.

Controls like most top-down shooter games. Shoot on the right mouse button and move on WASD.

Enjoy the game :)
